topic.title: New Proxy Site OnlyZero.net
topic.body:
I am proud to announce a new proxy site, https://onlyzero.net
or https://onlyzero.net:43110
if you insist 
I am MilitaryRiotLab (MRL), with some help from ZeroMe, this site will run forever until I run out of money

topic.title: ZeroMe RSS feed
topic.body:
[https://onlyzero.net/ZeroMe_rss/](https://onlyzero.net/ZeroMe_rss/)

Please report any problem / advice

* Limited to 500 entries
* Update every 15 mins

[Github](https://github.com/MilitaryRiotLab/ZeroMe-RSS)

1_1EnFfeVqTYtJfhzucfQB8Z7sCfUBipRRow.body:
Donations are always welcome,
Bitcoin: 31nWtEGC89Ja5wZ2HDWQuhsDfEjtgPRM9S

> [phr34kz](#comment_27_1NGTMtN8816KeCtNqy6W4fCQduU4P8iwty): Bruh... fuck donations. I run a VPS too with ZeroNet. Get a job and donate to the Zero Creators instead. Smfh

agree, maybe I'll just remove the link and run this proxy until I ran out of my student loan :(

EDIT: How about now ?

> [v1g1l4nt3](#comment_1_1Vu4btLMkXQ1Kw2XoVgUJQync7noqtzrF): Let me tell you something: I thank you very much for this proxy site. Do you have any way for to donate to you anonymously?

Bitcoin is available, Bitcoin: 31nWtEGC89Ja5wZ2HDWQuhsDfEjtgPRM9S
Follow me at ZeroMe(plus) can also support me, not only money

> [pinkk7465](#comment_1_1BnSx1AaPuFnpi1ufDgPdDudVxqV1yt7t8): So if someone were silly enough to create their account on your proxy instead of their own computer, how would said person export their users.json file from your site? ^_^;;

They can find their masterseed by clicking "USER: xxxx" at ZeroHello, then import to their users.json
